name: 苏珊·霍尔曼
birth_place: 美国,俄亥俄州,鲍林格林
introduction: Susan Elizabeth Holmes-McKagan (born May 5, 1972) is an American model, television personality, and fashion designer. She has appeared on the covers of Vogue, Elle, Marie Claire and Playboy. She is also known as the public face and founder of her business venture Susan Holmes Swimwear. According to an interview by Elsa Klensch on CNN, Holmes earned the title "The Body" from iconic fashion photographer Steven Meisel.[citation needed] She is married to Guns N' Roses musician Duff McKagan.
